DOC.brief_summary: Study urinary vascular endothelial growth factor ( VEGF ) level patient glioblastoma , receive standard therapy . Hypothesis : urinary VEGF level serve predictor treatment response survival .
DOC.brief_title: URINARY VEGF Levels GBM Patients Radiation Treatment Protocol
DOC.detailed_description: Measurement urinary VEGF level pre treatment , immediately treatment , 1 month treatment
DOC.criteria: Patient must enrol RTOG GBM study prescribes 6000 cGy radiation therapy . Patient must meet eligibility requirement RTOG treatment study . ( If patient deem retrospectively ineligible RTOG treatment study , patient likewise ineligible study . ) Patient must sign studyspecific inform consent RTOG 0611 prior study entry . Patient able receive 6000 cGy radiation therapy .
DOC.keyword: Patients must enrol RTOG GBM study prescribes 6000 cGy radiation therapy .
